QuestData.Title: No Mercy for the Captured
QuestData.Description: We have more fools for you to kill.$B$BMy agents tell me that several of our good citizens have seen fit to fall into the hands of the Scarlet Onslaught.$B$BThis will not do.$B$BGo back to New Hearthglen and eliminate Deathguard Schneider, Senior Scrivener Kinnedius, Engineer Burke and Chancellor Amai.$B$BFrom what I hear, they're spread out throughout the area. No doubt they are being kept in cages awaiting torture.$B$BSpeak with them and then kill them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Spy Mistress Repine has asked you to slay Deathguard Schneider, Senior Scrivener Kinnedius, Engineer Burke, and Chancellor Amai.$B$BWhen you've accomplished this task, report your success to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's simple really. You're sent out to kill four incompetent fools that are likely to blab all of our secrets anytime now, and you go out and do it.$B$B<The high executor puts on an unholy grin.>
QuestData.RewardText: What? You were expecting us to have you rescue them?$B$BNow why would we do that when they have a proven track record of getting themselves captured in the first place?$B$BNorthrend is a cold place, young $n. I suggest that you adjust to it.
